column4: is it better to install PAE on my 32bit ubuntu or install the 64bit edition, so i can have available all 8gb of ram?
pae can access 12gb ram. Depends on what the system will be used for
if you intend to encode audio and video then 64bit will help. If you have a lexmark printer then 32bit will allow you to use it due to half ass support
thanks, iÂ´ll check my hardware compatibility first, since it will do nothing more than a regular user does, webserfing, music/video playback and office work
